about_the_game:
Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise take place in a medieval world where an ancient evil force is threatening to rise again and seize control of the land.
Embody a chosen hero, destined to aid the Phantom King and his malevolent resurrection, however through the intervention of greater beings, you now have a chance to change fate. As a remnant of the Phantom King's essence, you are equip with the power to defeat him. Though you must defeat what remains of the Phantom King's army first.
Armed with weapons, armor, and a vast array of spells, you must face hordes of enemies, level up, and collect powerful armor pieces to customize and strengthen your abilities.

  • Battle Powerful Enemies
Utilize the parry ability to deflect enemy attacks increasing their fatigue gauge. Once full, your enemies will be vulnerable to a devastating crushing blow.

  • Equip and Customize
Equip gauntlets to cast spells with combat shifting effects, and armor that grants stat bonuses.

Hone your skills utilizing different weapons and strategies while exploring a rich, immersive world filled with danger and adventure.
